recipesJson.name: Mama Js Game Over Custard
recipesJson.author: wllmc
recipesJson.description: my personal favorite custard recipe and all day vape. Hope you enjoy it!

reviews.text: Custard lover since birth and I really enjoyed this off the shake that I made 2 bottles of 120.  The first bottle was gone pretty quick and I let the 2nd steep for 50 days.  Still good but flavor seems to have been quieted. Could be my taste buds have grown used to it.   I still have some left and I have zero self control.  If the 2nd bottle goes just as fast as the first then I'd give it the 5 stars.***UPDATE*** This is one of if not THE BEST custard recipe on this site.  Don't know what I was thinking earlier.  Easy 5 stars

If you love anything custard, you won't go wrong with having a bottle of this on your shelf. I'm having quite a few ideas on how to utilise this as a base for tobaccos and other fruits - it's really good. And if you've been disappointed with other custards as a DIYer, this one won't. Does leave a little gunk - after about going through 50mL of this stuff - but still worth it. Will definitely remix.
This turned out to be an incredible custard vape! Great job wllmc
This is a great custard. Smooth, sweet, great custard notes, which a good amount of vanilla and mouthfeel. Fell in love with this custard quickly, and have returned to it several times!

GOC is one of my "On the Road" juices. I travel a lot for work and this is one of four juices I always take with me. And it's versatile as well. Want a strawberry custard, just add your favorite strawberry. The sky is the limit...
